title: Brent Scowcroft International Affairs Library | The Montfort Academy | Authentic Catholic Education & Classical Excellence

organizations.name: The Scowcroft Group
quotes: Former National Security Adviser of the United States of America Lt. Gen. Brent Scowcroft (USAF, ret.) and his colleagues at The Scowcroft Group of Washington, D.C. made a very meaningful and extraordinary donation of his personal collection of the biographies and autobiographies of world leaders.

organizations.name: The Montfort Academy
quotes: The Montfort Academy is forever grateful to this American hero for this very special collection.

organizations.name: United States of America
quotes: Former National Security Adviser of the United States of America Lt. Gen. Brent Scowcroft (USAF, ret.)

organizations.name: United States Foreign Policy
quotes: There are few words that can describe the impact of Brent Scowcroft on American history and on the lives of many young people he mentored, especially in his very pragmatic approach to United States Foreign Policy.

roles.title: Presidents of the United States
quotes: Many of these precious volumes are signed by Presidents of the United States, Vice Presidents, First Ladies, Prime Ministers, Secretaries of Defense, Secretaries of State, and many others.

Former National Security Adviser of the United States of America Lt. Gen. Brent Scowcroft (USAF, ret.) and his colleagues at The Scowcroft Group of Washington, D.C. made a very meaningful and extraordinary donation of his personal collection of the biographies and autobiographies of world leaders.
